modName: Player Home in Helsmyrr Village (Plus bug fixes)
summary: Just a simple no frills player home in the lovely Helsmyrr Village, by Maverick11  Also includes bug fixes and adjustments to the original mod.
descriptionHtml:
A simple player home in the picturesque [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64442]Helsmyrr Village[/url].. And a few lil tweaks..
 

As pointed out by a few Nexus users this location was lacking a player home, so i added one! 


[youtube]V63bW6CFCuE[/youtube]

Thank you Curry Gaming Inc for taking the time to add this mod to your video!  



[size=3][b][i][u]This mod includes :
[/u][/i][/b][/size]

Player home that caters for all types of adventurer!

Ample storage

Master bedroom with double bed

Guest room on the lower floor with weapon racks, storage and mannequins

All types of crafting catered for
 
Enough bookcases, even for the most serious scholar 

Warm, cosy and spacious

Two second floor balcony's looking over the village

Nicely decorated and not too much clutter

Plenty of weapon racks, mannequins  and treasure storage

A basement that leads to a special shrine and bathing area


[size=3][b][i][u]Extras :[/u][/i][/b][/size]


Fixed the shadow striping issues in the inn, and adjusted all the interior lighting in the mod.

Fixed the creature's spawning inside the rocks in the village

Fixed trees popping out of rocks

Squeezed more FPS out of the exterior areas

Nerfed the amount of trainers in the village (You can still train in magic at the "Scholars Guild")

Fixed gaps in the rocks



[b][i][u][size=3]Optional  File :


[/size][/u][/i][/b]The optional file allows the player to buy the home, from "Sten" the General Goods store owner (far end of the village)  There you can buy the Deeds to the player home "Ambling Galt"   You can find the deeds in his "Clutter" inventory   The home is available for 30000 Septims, or 10000 if you have the required Speech Skills




[size=5][i][b]Installation[/b]

This mod requires the Helmyrr Village mod by Maverick11 or it will not work

[/i][/size]Link to the original mod :  [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64442]Helmyrr Village By Maverick11[/url]

This is a manual download as it is just an .esp, so pop the [i][b]Helsmyrr.esp[/b][/i]  in your Skyrim/data folder and overwrite anything.


[b][u][i][size=5]Uninstall
[/size][/i][/u][/b]

Remove [b][i]Helsmyrr.esp[/i][/b]     from your Skyrim/Data folder   




[size=5][b][i][u]Optional File Intallation

[/u][/i][/b][/size]
Manual install only :  drop the [b][i]Helsmyrr.esp[/i][/b] in your Skyrim/Data folder
Put the[b][i] PM_Script_BuyKey.pex[/i][/b] and the [b][i]Source[/i][/b] folder in your[b][i] [/i][/b]   Skyrim/Data/Scripts folder



[b][i][u][size=5]Uninstall Optional Files

[/size][/u][/i][/b]Remove the[b][i] Helsmyrr.esp[/i][/b] from your Skyrim/Data folder,  remove the [i]PM_Script_BuyKey.pex  [/i]from your Skyrim/Data/Scripts folder
Remove [i]PM_Script_BuyKey.psc [/i]from your Skyrim/Data/Scripts/Source folder



Future Plans :

I would like to make more variations of the home to accommodate guests and children

A Real Shelter version

SSE Version



[size=4][b][i]I have used resources already in the original mod, but I feel the need to link those who created them here :


[/i][/b][/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53192/?]Elianora's Extra Resources [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16525/?]Modder's Resource Pack[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63255/]Upper Class Furniture Pack[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2250922/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Blary[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11618]Modder's Resource Pack (Uploaded by Eldiabs)[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11618]Hodminir Plants And Trees[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12394]Celtic Decor For Skyrim[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42362/]Open Books[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42362/]Lolicept Resources[/url]

And a big thank you to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4672007]DarkFox127[/url]﻿ for his script that allows me to sell the "Deeds" to the player, and for all he has done for the community.



Please send me any feedback, and pictures of your game too!
author: Shinobus
